definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Lay thy shadow on the sundials.
sentences.chinese: 把你的陰影投放在日規上。

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese people measured time with sundials.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代使用日規計量時間。

sentences.english: Lay the shadow on the sundials.
sentences.chinese: 把你的陰影落在日規上。

sentences.english: Lay your shadows over the sundial.
sentences.chinese: 把你的影子投放在日規上。
